Introduction

Sohee is a South Korean singer formelybunder KM Entertainment. She made her official debut on September 8, 2021, as a member of the girl group ICHILLIN'.

On July 15th, 2022, KM Entertainment announced that Sohee would be leaving ICHILLIN' after discussing her future career.
